name: Majicks Dash Demo
description:
Majicks Dash

Majicks Dash  is a platformer where the players main objective is to parkour through levels, collecting bonuses, milk, and coins, eventually to defeat the boss at the end. It includes a unique dash mechanic where the player is given the ability to dash in any given direction once mid air. 

The game is still being worked on and is in still in development. Some things might change.

    

(Recommended) Controls:
  •  A & D to move left and right
  • W/Space to jump
  • Right Click to do a mid-air dash

*It's recommended to use a mouse to play the game; future versions will incorporate more features to make it easier for people who don't have a mouse to be able to play as well.

More levels are in development! Please, leave your feedback in the comments. Let's play videos are also appreciated! If you encounter a bug, feel free to notify us in the comment section.

Keep in mind, some of the screenshots include levels that are still in development. Those parts of the game will be released in due time. For the time being, the game is made up of about 5 levels total, inclusive of the boss battle.


Extract the zip file anywhere on your computer and run the 'Majicks Dash.exe' file. Hope you'll enjoy your playthrough!

If you have any problems with the installation process, please comment down below.

This game was made using:

  • Retro Lines Asset Pack (https://v3x3d.itch.io/retro-lines)
  • Aseprite (https://www.aseprite.org/)
  • Piskel (https://www.piskelapp.com/)
  • Unity (https://unity.com/)
  • Visual Studio 2019 (https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/)
